title: Watching Australia documentary motivates me for Ashes - Root
description: England Test captain Joe Root says watching the documentary series about Australia has helped motivate him for next winter's Ashes.
content:
Root has won 20 of his 39 Tests as England captain.
England Test captain Joe Root says watching the documentary series about the Australia team has helped motivate him for next winter's Ashes.
'The Test' features footage from inside the dressing room and en… [+2748 chars]
